enb_long_title: Year-End Update on the Framework Convention on Climate Change 1995
sentences: Santiago Gomez-Acebo, on behalf of the European Union, said the EU reaffirms its commitment to stabilize carbon dioxide emissions at 1990 levels by the year 2000 and called upon the other Annex I Parties to the Convention to do the same.

The decision contained in the Berlin Mandate - to begin a process for taking action beyond the year 2000, including the strengthening of commitments of the Parties included in Annex I - is a major achievement.
The European Union trusts that the decision to establish the Secretariat of the Convention in Bonn will contribute to setting the future work of the Convention on solid ground.
